(Medium)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/tools/move-package-cache/src/file_lock.rs] [Struct: FileLock] [Lock Verification] Is there any mechanism to verify that a FileLock actually holds the exclusive lock it claims to hold, or can stale FileLock objects be used after their locks have been released, causing false assumptions about exclusivity? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/tools/move-package-cache/src/file_lock.rs] [Struct: FileLock] [IPC Security] Can lock files be used as a covert channel for inter-process communication by encoding data in lock file names or timing patterns, potentially leaking sensitive information about Move package builds? (High)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/tools/move-package-cache/src/file_lock.rs] [Function: drop()] [Container Cleanup] If a Docker container is force-stopped while holding locks, are lock files properly cleaned up by the container runtime, or do they persist in volumes causing subsequent builds to fail? [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/tools/move-package-cache/src/file_lock.rs] [Function: lock_with_alert_on_wait()] [Timeout Testing] Can the alert_timeout mechanism be tested reliably, or do timing-dependent tests introduce flakiness that masks real bugs in lock acquisition logic? (Low)
